name: PHPSESSID
purpose: Native to PHP and enables websites to store serialised state data.

name: cookie_notice_accepted
purpose: Used to see whether the cookie notice has been accepted.

name: dsp
purpose: Used to track the latest DSP the user same from.

name: externalParams
purpose: Used to track any external parameters set by third party integrations or any other data not being tracked in any other way..

name: f
purpose: Used to track the latest funnel the user came from.

name: uf
purpose: Used to track the unknown funnel the user came from.

name: uuid
purpose: Stores a universally unique identifier  allowing the tracking of the same visitor across multiple pages and sessions.

name: woocommerce_cart_hash
purpose: Helps WooCommerce determine when cart contents/data changes.

name: woocommerce_items_in_cart
purpose: Helps WooCommerce determine when cart contents/data changes.

name: wordpress_sec_{UID}
purpose: This cookie is used to store your authentication details.

name: wp_woocommerce_session_{UID}
purpose: Contains a unique code for each customer so that it knows where to find the cart data in the database for each customer.
